name: markdown-preview
description: Full-stack markdown preview application with Rust backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cargo run" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: cargo test && cd frontend && npm test --if-present
scripts.clean: cargo clean && cd frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache

author: Markdown Preview Team
